reviews.review_msg: Very sweet lady, extremely dedicated and approachable.
What can I say about Sima.  She is an incredibly nice, friendly, funny, and helpful Professor.  I really enjoyed the course and look forward to taking future courses with her.  Sima ROCKS

Her lectures were horrible. All she did was read from the textbook. The textbooks were easily the worst I've ever had. Nobody in the course knew what she wanted. Grading was arbitrary and her knowledge was very limited. Avoid her at all costs.
The best prof ever; fair grading framework and is very friendly. I would highly recommend him!!
Best prof ever, really nice with the marks.
Would highly recommend him. Easy professor.
The best prof in the department. Kevin is friendly, very experienced, cares for his students and teaches real life politics. Easy to understand.
The best prof ever!
He is so friendly and knows how to teach properly. Highly respected!!!
The best prof in the department. He is good with the marking and gives clear instructions on how to excel in class. Please take him!!
The Best Professor in the department in every measure. Do the work and you'll fly.
Fair marker, very approachable and helpful. Specialized in local government and policy decisions.  Has a good sense of humor, and generally fair lecturing style using powerpoints.
Awesome Prof. Easy going and classes are fun. He uses a lot of youtube videos to illustrate his points. extremely helpful and encouraging.

You must attend lectures and participate for marks.  She has strong biases in her material, so don't expect a wide variety of viewpoints.  A nice lady, but not the best professor.  Her lectures have 100+ slides per lecture, and she goes all over the place with them, so there is no real precision to the lectures.  OK overall, but not an easy marker.

Aude-Claire isn't here to mess around - and for that you should be thankful. She knows her material so well and knows to what length you can go to absorb it and use it which might be something you didn't realize you could do yourself. Don't take her feedback personal, DO take the time to see her during her office hours.

she wants you to work for your grade, but that doesn't mean grades are everything to her. she wants you to learn and actually retain information from the course. she wants you to participate and think. she cares about the well-being of her students and won't hesitate to offer extra help outside of the classroom to get you that good grade you want.

I've had one class with Dr. Fourot and she is one of the best professors I've ever had. She cares deeply about her students and the readings and content are always very interesting. She's always good-natured, funny, and clearly brilliant, and she knows her topics amazingly well. She's not an easy marker, but if you put in the time you'll do well.

If you ever read her teaching philosophy, you would know this teacher is a wonderful, wonderful teacher who has a passion in teaching and caring about her students. There are plenty of reading and you are required to understand the week's topic. If not, you will be in trouble for your final exam!! So be prepared!!
Nice, but at times her instructions were confusing.

I took two classes with this prof and I have to say, she is wonderful. There are lots of readings and they are discussed every class, so be prepared. She is very flexible and understanding BUT she does push you! Be prepared to think. The class material is very interesting, and if you are engaged and hardworking, an A is within your reach!
Excellent Teacher, liked his attitude to let students approach the material the way they feel comfortable. Very helpful.
Haven't ever taken a course of his but I used one of his works as a reference in my thesis. incredibly intelligent man with lots to stimulate the young mind. Highly recommended.

The ideal professor.  He will help you if you ask him, and he will ignore you if you want to just sit in the corner and get a B.  People that dislike him are either uptight and dislike his tangents, or are daft enough that they fail to recognize his tangents are entirely connected to the material.  Smart and honest, and treats you like an adult.
A good professor, requires more analysis than your average teacher here. Was very helpful to me when I went and saw him during office hours.

One of my favorite profs. If you are legitimately interested in understanding Poli Sci this is the guy for you. If you are just trying to sail through your degree with the minimum amout of effort you will not like him.
